name: Coyote Moon Golf Course
description: Premier Truckee mountain layout through towering pines—popular for golf groups, outings, and corporate events.

faqs.question: What’s included in Coyote Moon golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Coyote Moon, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Coyote Moon packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $199–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging selection, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Coyote Moon Golf Course | Truckee Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Plan Coyote Moon in Truckee with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips. Rated 4.8/5 (347).
